statements: SELECT * FROM exit_interviews;
SELECT employee_name, exit_reason FROM exit_interviews WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT exit_interview_date, satisfaction_level FROM exit_interviews WHERE exit_reason = 'Resignation';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, exit_reason, satisfaction_level FROM exit_interviews ORDER BY exit_interview_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 AND exit_reason LIKE '%layoff%';
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_name, exit_reason FROM exit_interviews WHERE exit_interview_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, satisfaction_level FROM exit_interviews WHERE satisfaction_level >= 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT employee_name, exit_reason, additional_comments FROM exit_interviews WHERE exit_reason = 'Retirement' OR exit_reason = 'Layoff' ORDER BY exit_reason ASC;
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews WHERE exit_interview_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews;
SELECT employee_id, exit_reason FROM exit_interviews WHERE exit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_details ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews WHERE employee_id = 123456;
SELECT last_name, hire_date FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews WHERE exit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, exit_reason FROM exit_interviews WHERE exit_reason = 'Retirement';
SELECT * FROM employee_details ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employee_details WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' AND hire_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews;
SELECT employee_id, exit_date FROM exit_interviews WHERE reason = 'Retirement';
SELECT employee_id, reason FROM exit_interviews WHERE exit_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_details ORDER BY department ASC, hire_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department='HR';
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews ORDER BY exit_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employee_details WHERE department='IT' AND hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, reason_description FROM employee_details JOIN exit_interviews ON employee_details.employee_id = exit_interviews.employee_id JOIN turnover_reasons ON exit_interviews.reason = turnover_reasons.reason_description;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, exit_date FROM employee_details JOIN exit_interviews ON employee_details.employee_id = exit_interviews.employee_id WHERE exit_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews;
SELECT employee_id, reason FROM exit_interviews WHERE reason = 'Personal Reasons';
SELECT date_time, response FROM exit_interview_responses ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employee_information WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT month_year, turnover_rate FROM turnover_rates WHERE turnover_rate > 10.00;
SELECT * FROM exit_interviews ORDER BY employee_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT reason, comments FROM exit_interviews WHERE employee_id = 1001
SELECT name, department FROM employee_information WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT AVG(turnover_rate) AS avg_rate FROM turnover_rates
SELECT response, date_time FROM exit_interview_responses ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM EmployeeExitInterviews;
SELECT employee_id, exit_reason FROM EmployeeExitInterviews WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM ExitInterviewResponses ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 200 AND 300;
SELECT response_id, response, employee_id FROM ExitInterviewResponses WHERE response LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeExitInterviews WHERE exit_reason = 'Retirement' ORDER BY exit_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, last_name FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_id FROM EmployeeDetails e INNER JOIN EmployeeDepartments d ON e.employee_id = d.employee_id WHERE d.department_id = 102;
SELECT q.question_text, r.response, r.interview_date FROM ExitInterviewQuestions q LEFT JOIN ExitInterviewResponses r ON q.question_id = r.response_id;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.hire_date FROM EmployeeDetails e WHERE e.employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM EmployeeDepartments WHERE department_id = 101);
